/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a warm touch to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, creating a network of lines against the sky. Trees and bushes dot the sides of the street, their greenery contrasting with the brick buildings. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting the two sides of the city. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
